FBS_EQUI (ENUM)
FBS_EQUI (ENUM)
Â¶
TYPE FBS_EQUI :
Definition of SF_Equivalent function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only
InOut:
Name
Initial
Comment
IDLE
16#0
The function block is not active (initial state).
INIT
16#8801
An activation has been detected by the FB and the FB is now
activated.
OUT_ENABLED
16#8000
The inputs switched to TRUE in equivalent mode.
WAIT_FOR_CH_B
16#8802
Channel A has been switched to TRUE - waiting for Channel B;
discrepancy timer started.
WAIT_FOR_CH_A
16#8804
Channel B has been switched to TRUE - waiting for Channel A;
discrepancy timer started.
FROM_ACTIVE_WAIT
16#8806
One channel has been switched to FALSE; waiting for the
second channel to be switched to FALSE, discrepancy timer
started.
ERROR_1
16#C010
Discrepancy time elapsed in state WAIT_FOR_CH_B.
ERROR_2
16#C020
Discrepancy time elapsed in state WAIT_FOR_CH_A.
ERROR_3
16#C030
Discrepancy time elapsed in state FROM_ACTIVE_WAIT.

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The function block is not active (initial state).

rows.Name: INIT
rows.Comment:
An activation has been detected by the FB and the FB is now
activated.

rows.Name: OUT_ENABLED
rows.Comment: The inputs switched to TRUE in equivalent mode.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_CH_B
rows.Comment:
Channel A has been switched to TRUE - waiting for Channel B;
discrepancy timer started.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_CH_A
rows.Comment:
Channel B has been switched to TRUE - waiting for Channel A;
discrepancy timer started.

rows.Name: FROM_ACTIVE_WAIT
rows.Comment:
One channel has been switched to FALSE; waiting for the
second channel to be switched to FALSE, discrepancy timer
started.

rows.Name: ERROR_1
rows.Comment: Discrepancy time elapsed in state WAIT_FOR_CH_B.

rows.Name: ERROR_2
rows.Comment: Discrepancy time elapsed in state WAIT_FOR_CH_A.

rows.Name: ERROR_3
rows.Comment: Discrepancy time elapsed in state FROM_ACTIVE_WAIT.
